tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE protein_identification (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  protein_name VARCHAR(255),
  peptide_sequence TEXT,
  peptide_mass FLOAT,
  retention_time FLOAT,
  abundance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE proteins (
    protein_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_name VARCHAR(255),
    protein_sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE peptides (
    peptide_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    peptide_sequence TEXT,
    protein_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (protein_id) REFERENCES proteins(protein_id)
)

CREATE TABLE spectra (
    spectrum_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    peptide_id UUID,
    intensity FLOAT,
    retention_time FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (peptide_id) REFERENCES peptides(peptide_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Proteins (
    protein_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Peptides (
    peptide_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sequence TEXT,
    protein_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (protein_id) REFERENCES Proteins(protein_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Spectra (
    spectrum_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    spectrum_data BLOB,
    peptide_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (peptide_id) REFERENCES Peptides(peptide_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Experiments (
    exp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exp_name VARCHAR(255),
    exp_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Quantification (
    quant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    value DOUBLE,
    spectrum_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (spectrum_id) REFERENCES Spectra(spectrum_id)
)
